description:
After Keroro plays a cursed DVD, he finds himself trapped in his room, with a monster waiting in the hallway. Then, Keroro "helps" the irritable Natsumi by creating a robot that enforces everything she decides to ban, but seems to pick on Giroro especially.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, The DVD of Curses / Natsumi, By All Means, What is This Prohibition!
クルル 呪いのDVD / 夏美 何がなんでも禁止よ!
